Backend

## 

<span key="38cadcaaaa884bc49d9dc4141feb3a52">**What is Backend Development?**</span>

<span key="e8a392eb009647f99f4adb3e7f59187c"><span offset-key="e8a392eb009647f99f4adb3e7f59187c:0">As mentioned above, backend development is what keeps the internet running behind the scenes.</span></span>

<span key="a566daa44a264723918e39290904e780"><span offset-key="a566daa44a264723918e39290904e780:0">Backend developers are primarily focused on how a website works. They write code that focuses on the functionality and logic powering the application they’re working on, and the technology they work on is never directly seen by users.</span></span>

<span key="9c09a1946a684c8c9457d4d50782f45d"><span offset-key="9c09a1946a684c8c9457d4d50782f45d:0">The </span></span><a href="https://www.careerexplorer.com/careers/back-end-developer/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b0c64c80b3bb4610b14c4e9fc33b0ab2" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="bd3f7b431c4c431583383cb76f2c1a19"><span data-offset-key="bd3f7b431c4c431583383cb76f2c1a19:0">tech of the back end</span></span></span></a><span key="55dc587be082443db1451c9392ccc327"><span offset-key="55dc587be082443db1451c9392ccc327:0"> is a combination of servers, applications, and databases.</span></span>

<span key="99d9103e7f1a4f1fb84735f149596425"><span offset-key="99d9103e7f1a4f1fb84735f149596425:0">Responsibilities of backend programmers could involve writing APIs, writing code to interact with a database, creating libraries, working on business processes and data architecture, and much more. It often depends on the specific role and company.</span></span>

## 

<span key="7a3797238c0e4a2aaf74408386c70d59">**Front-end Vs Backend Programming**</span>

<span key="0ef52ace6a9b462289897581fa3e1f66"><span offset-key="0ef52ace6a9b462289897581fa3e1f66:0">Intuitively, the other side of backend development is the front end.</span></span>

<span key="6d62e9c008884fa989ec1d9478d2eb04"><span offset-key="6d62e9c008884fa989ec1d9478d2eb04:0">The key difference is that while backend developers build how a website functions, front-end programmers build and design the interface, determining how the site looks to users.</span></span>

<span key="d90e4df3a6df45ae8d71efc64c69c01b"><span offset-key="d90e4df3a6df45ae8d71efc64c69c01b:0">Backend web development </span></span><a href="https://www.roberthalf.com/blog/salaries-and-skills/what-is-the-best-programming-language-for-your-backend-developer-career" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8af563eb66574cc9b9aa8b9580195a3b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="1aa0553b25604bb8953ed16cc17deaba"><span data-offset-key="1aa0553b25604bb8953ed16cc17deaba:0">lays the foundational code</span></span></span></a><span key="a2414fefc4d94853889119523c3a17f6"><span offset-key="a2414fefc4d94853889119523c3a17f6:0"> that enables websites to process the actions that users take on the front end and deliver the correct information in return.</span></span>

<span key="158163e61ad84589822c19ead241d248"><span offset-key="158163e61ad84589822c19ead241d248:0">Neither works without the other—you need the back end to make the front end work, and you need the front end so people can actually access and interact with the website.</span></span>

<span key="101c2bf899ce473f8411867698eb0b78"><span offset-key="101c2bf899ce473f8411867698eb0b78:0">Backend developers typically earn higher salaries than front-end developers, as backend languages tend to be more technical. The average salary for a backend developer is </span></span><a href="https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/backend-developer-salary-SRCH_KO0,17.htm" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b60f353713bb4291a2774e4a71fa6427" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="ab73613ad0a541e2b2937ee208e7b0d1"><span data-offset-key="ab73613ad0a541e2b2937ee208e7b0d1:0">$101,619/yr</span></span></span></a><span key="f05f57d00aba4ecea6683f887497383e"><span offset-key="f05f57d00aba4ecea6683f887497383e:0">, while front-end developers earn </span></span><a href="https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/front-end-developer-salary-SRCH_KO0,19.htm" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="049aecc0b8a64e99b0d63b32eac04086" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="9f4c6deb85b54b6da2af8603cb5d278b"><span data-offset-key="9f4c6deb85b54b6da2af8603cb5d278b:0">$76,929/yr</span></span></span></a><span key="24be03d07a4644e0b08da3d0b4671820"><span offset-key="24be03d07a4644e0b08da3d0b4671820:0">.</span></span>

<span key="1a7f728908b54900a4229fdfd8118c38"><span offset-key="1a7f728908b54900a4229fdfd8118c38:0">There are also full-stack developers, who can work with both backend and front-end technologies. They’re the jack-of-all-trades of the programming world.</span></span>

<span key="99a3fc20722f4bdfb852f9c9bc80862c"><span offset-key="99a3fc20722f4bdfb852f9c9bc80862c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/web-dev/front-end-developer-skills/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="1dd29ab2c3244a6ba41a34019c167924" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="91a0c02ecc7c488e8dff5e052d7bbec3"><span data-offset-key="91a0c02ecc7c488e8dff5e052d7bbec3:0">Learn more about what’s involved in front-end development in this post.</span></span></span></a><span key="c785da2a63df4f489e391088ff3d847d"><span offset-key="c785da2a63df4f489e391088ff3d847d:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="4a6113eb4fe34a6281c33b5fb6944c1e"><span offset-key="4a6113eb4fe34a6281c33b5fb6944c1e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/posts/backend-development/#toc" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="92fa896997784946a4061a83125f6538" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="d20f611f1d1a42a3ae4447ea4fac2876"><span data-offset-key="d20f611f1d1a42a3ae4447ea4fac2876:0">Head back to the table of contents »</span></span></span></a><span key="f1160e2bbe71416da0e69fea4727bc63"><span offset-key="f1160e2bbe71416da0e69fea4727bc63:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

## 

<span key="2ed8e5f304024f9c91ce35e5c14fa6b8"><span offset-key="2ed8e5f304024f9c91ce35e5c14fa6b8:0">Types of Backend Development Languages</span></span>

<span key="fe0fa73b001048d5b3c03dd2508d150b"><span offset-key="fe0fa73b001048d5b3c03dd2508d150b:0">Backend programming can either be \*\*object-oriented (OOP) \*\*or </span>**functional**<span offset-key="fe0fa73b001048d5b3c03dd2508d150b:2">.</span></span>

<span key="3c0c64bbb8054db390941e0fdbce0428"><span offset-key="3c0c64bbb8054db390941e0fdbce0428:0">The former is the technique that focuses on the creation of objects. With object-oriented programming, statements should be executed in a particular order. Popular OOP languages are </span>**Java**<span offset-key="3c0c64bbb8054db390941e0fdbce0428:2">, </span>**.NET**<span offset-key="3c0c64bbb8054db390941e0fdbce0428:4">, and </span>**Python**<span offset-key="3c0c64bbb8054db390941e0fdbce0428:6">,</span></span>

<span key="30e61a6d6d29400993d8d23ee3cf7866"><span offset-key="30e61a6d6d29400993d8d23ee3cf7866:0">The latter is a technique that is more “action”-based. Functional programming uses declarative language, which means that statements can be executed in any order. It’s commonly used for </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/learn/data-science/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d94151b59fcd40349b9d0721636c66a4" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="04f94667f6864ca389facce974896546"><span data-offset-key="04f94667f6864ca389facce974896546:0">data science</span></span></span></a><span key="56d3682ba4f24c1cadb76893c675ac04"><span offset-key="56d3682ba4f24c1cadb76893c675ac04:0">, and popular languages are </span>**SQL**<span offset-key="56d3682ba4f24c1cadb76893c675ac04:2">, </span>**F#**<span offset-key="56d3682ba4f24c1cadb76893c675ac04:4">, and </span>**R**<span offset-key="56d3682ba4f24c1cadb76893c675ac04:6">.</span></span>

<span key="c5eeef1a8286471ba37ccbff92fd07ec"><span offset-key="c5eeef1a8286471ba37ccbff92fd07ec:0">Languages can either be\*\* statically typed\*\* or \*\*dynamically typed. \*\*The former is more rigid, but better at catching errors, whereas the latter is more flexible but allows for variables to change types (which could account for unexpected errors). This article by </span></span><a href="https://hackernoon.com/i-finally-understand-static-vs-dynamic-typing-and-you-will-too-ad0c2bd0acc7" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0248fc120bed4de29973d9b8ebe5a36b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="ccf2a77327ac487ca0e2aeec515c63a5"><span data-offset-key="ccf2a77327ac487ca0e2aeec515c63a5:0">Hacker Noon</span></span></span></a><span key="81a4d5cfafd148b4a8cfc872a0ef4ea3"><span offset-key="81a4d5cfafd148b4a8cfc872a0ef4ea3:0"> goes into greater detail if you’re interested in finding out more.</span></span>

<span key="28509f94c18b4e529387ee2dae799b71"><span offset-key="28509f94c18b4e529387ee2dae799b71:0">Start coding now</span></span>

<span key="600596c608ac4f0388b95b3f30f6bc94"><span offset-key="600596c608ac4f0388b95b3f30f6bc94:0">Stop waiting and start learning! Get my 10 tips on teaching yourself how to code.GET THE TIPS!Don't worry. I'll never, ever spam you!</span></span>

## 

<span key="563f79caf77e43338ed8d6ee701f23ba"><span offset-key="563f79caf77e43338ed8d6ee701f23ba:0">7 Popular Backend Programming Languages</span></span>

<span key="a43051f0ec224d4e8520c078e0608c30"><span offset-key="a43051f0ec224d4e8520c078e0608c30:0">Now, let’s take a look at some specific backend development languages and what they’re used for.</span></span>

### 

<span key="f01dd5d37cb54872af97bc8c3ca787c9"><span offset-key="f01dd5d37cb54872af97bc8c3ca787c9:0">Backend Language #1: Java</span></span>

<span key="9f7685aad7834a0785f2cade78f1a39e"><span offset-key="9f7685aad7834a0785f2cade78f1a39e:0">Java is the world’s </span></span><a href="https://www.codingdojo.com/blog/7-most-in-demand-programming-languages-of-2018/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="636e404472ca406987fac84b7f0e8046" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="2b2e1ba890014a9a86b63f81812dc8ec"><span data-offset-key="2b2e1ba890014a9a86b63f81812dc8ec:0">most popular</span></span></span></a><span key="929dc7dc61b743b9bef4f8c46173c243"><span offset-key="929dc7dc61b743b9bef4f8c46173c243:0"> programming language—and for good reason. Not only is Java extremely versatile (its use spans from smartphones to smart cards); it has also been used by developers for over 20 years.</span></span>

<span key="225e38f3620b41058cfb3749fafc7e40"><span offset-key="225e38f3620b41058cfb3749fafc7e40:0">What makes Java so versatile is the Java Virtual Machine (JVM). With many development languages, compiling a program creates code that may run differently if the computers it’s run on are different. This is not an issue for Java because of the JVM. The Java Virtual Machine acts like a middle layer that can run code on any computer, regardless of where the said code was compiled.</span></span>

<span key="7dd2689c903041afa36c8ee7ee67cde0"><span offset-key="7dd2689c903041afa36c8ee7ee67cde0:0">While Java is extremely popular with desktop and business software developers, it is less beginner-friendly than a language like Python. This is because it’s verbose and requires more code to build out features; as a result, it’s less rewarding to those just starting out.</span></span>

<span key="569fcddb2a5141cfaed7760f1126c8be"><span offset-key="569fcddb2a5141cfaed7760f1126c8be:0">That said, Java’s longstanding popularity and varied use mean that its community is large. Consequently, any questions you may have about the language will likely have forum threads and online tutorials dedicated to answering it.</span></span>

<span key="e3f1c5fca71f461081f0359e2cbada5e">**💡 WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH JAVA**</span>

<span key="5d737fd5d3e144daaa6191cd7f683ffe"><span offset-key="5d737fd5d3e144daaa6191cd7f683ffe:0">Java backend technologies can be used to achieve a lot of objectives, including these and more:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="78eb1510995244759505282724126c55"><span offset-key="78eb1510995244759505282724126c55:0">Website development</span></span>

<span key="9d442dd557f641e4aee2cfaf35899fc4">**💼 COMPANIES THAT USE JAVA**</span>

<span key="8cdff83ebd5241108b8d6f6d26c87c5f"><span offset-key="8cdff83ebd5241108b8d6f6d26c87c5f:0">There are some </span></span><a href="https://stackshare.io/java" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="efa8ce066b1b48a38c46755eb9962d37" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="9257f507381e4aa19c08a49e4168ca2c"><span data-offset-key="9257f507381e4aa19c08a49e4168ca2c:0">big names among companies</span></span></span></a><span key="81a0868a84ba434d80eeec2c80861b8d"><span offset-key="81a0868a84ba434d80eeec2c80861b8d:0"> that use Java backend technologies, including these:</span></span>

<span key="4c74d40b294246678f37eb22ef00eb31">**💵 AVERAGE SALARY FOR JAVA DEVELOPERS**</span>

<span key="86850a0025204ef18aca83470174c7e5"><span offset-key="86850a0025204ef18aca83470174c7e5:0">As of </span></span><a href="https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/java-developer-salary-SRCH_KO0,14.htm" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="3d18c93d36eb4e25892b91fd6365609a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="96a1ce8740e247ba83643070ddb1b1cf"><span data-offset-key="96a1ce8740e247ba83643070ddb1b1cf:0">April 2020</span></span></span></a><span key="7cb65dd625ee44d9aa14fbf7659818cd"><span offset-key="7cb65dd625ee44d9aa14fbf7659818cd:0">, Java developers made an average of $79,137/year in the US with salaries ranging from $57k to $117k.</span></span>

### 

<span key="18ee9b8d2c774c069abe57888e12e627"><span offset-key="18ee9b8d2c774c069abe57888e12e627:0">Backend Language #2: PHP</span></span>

<span key="b8c43529e0114abda3ec47eb742817a2"><span offset-key="b8c43529e0114abda3ec47eb742817a2:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="http://php.net" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="24b7a57b3a5e4d43a59c1ffd0ff9a20a" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="15994ef701144facbd1c68bcc12f7ef7"><span data-offset-key="15994ef701144facbd1c68bcc12f7ef7:0">PHP</span></span></span></a><span key="024946efd70c41e78d4f12db9b615f74"><span offset-key="024946efd70c41e78d4f12db9b615f74:0"> powers </span></span><a href="https://w3techs.com/technologies/details/pl-php/all/all" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e80f8dc7e43441f5bb31ca9bcd71aef7" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="81861b60757c4a3e85e7bf069d3f2878"><span data-offset-key="81861b60757c4a3e85e7bf069d3f2878:0">78.2% of all websites</span></span></span></a><span key="8bd2d1be34d04784a87a13d52d5c9f21"><span offset-key="8bd2d1be34d04784a87a13d52d5c9f21:0"> whose server-side programming language we know. The language was first released in 1995 when there were few options for building dynamic websites.</span></span>

<span key="541db2e19f444419a6856b684c097115"><span offset-key="541db2e19f444419a6856b684c097115:0">PHP</span></span>

<span key="e817ea67db7841f2b9ef2b71d9da409b"><span offset-key="e817ea67db7841f2b9ef2b71d9da409b:0">Since PHP is dynamically typed, it means you’re able to come up with a variety of solutions and workarounds for one problem. It also means that the same bit of code can mean something different depending on the context, which makes programs written in PHP tricky to scale and sometimes slow to run.</span></span>

<span key="f92ccb735ce04a93907b0a56eb231302"><span offset-key="f92ccb735ce04a93907b0a56eb231302:0">PHP is a </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/go/goskills-intro-php/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="a3ebe40e9d7143d9a9955af21bb5034f" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="999923926fd74b27a664826e63f5c064"><span data-offset-key="999923926fd74b27a664826e63f5c064:0">great language to learn</span></span></span></a><span key="fcb5f6dd25004d9fa147379c626363eb"><span offset-key="fcb5f6dd25004d9fa147379c626363eb:0"> for those who are just starting out for a number of reasons:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="acbb1e8a1c7943b1a8982098f7fb2879"><span offset-key="acbb1e8a1c7943b1a8982098f7fb2879:0">It’s more forgiving of errors, which means that you’re able to compile and run a program until you reach a problematic part.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="3a2c317754064c3e9a81d559b498d555"><span offset-key="3a2c317754064c3e9a81d559b498d555:0">There is an abundance of resources dedicated to the language as a result of the large community and tool support. The language undergoes updates, so ensure you’re learning from an up-to-date tutorial.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="f5357305bfa540d3a059fa4058dd8a91"><span offset-key="f5357305bfa540d3a059fa4058dd8a91:0">The setup is relatively easy compared to a language like Ruby on Rails. You can download </span></span><a href="https://www.mamp.info/en/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="be12af0bec5a4c21b6fba236913535aa" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="6d20c0ef6a7b4b12bedfe69a54ab6d79"><span data-offset-key="6d20c0ef6a7b4b12bedfe69a54ab6d79:0">MAMP</span></span></span></a><span key="617adc59effc44d9b206ebbe9959e413"><span offset-key="617adc59effc44d9b206ebbe9959e413:0"> (for Macs) or WAMP (</span></span><a href="https://sourceforge.net/projects/wampserver/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="8ae80d3861944716b1d4a9cd9bb920d9" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="c088c41eb19b43ed86898738fbdbbbef"><span data-offset-key="c088c41eb19b43ed86898738fbdbbbef:0">for Windows</span></span></span></a><span key="745ea8560ade46278a459b88e35ab8b0"><span offset-key="745ea8560ade46278a459b88e35ab8b0:0">) and you should be ready to go in 5 minutes.</span></span>

<span key="d6e88054d8ef436cb9321fb6616e688a">**💡 WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH PHP**</span>

<span key="4eab67efeccc4b5191f84bffef27f7ad"><span offset-key="4eab67efeccc4b5191f84bffef27f7ad:0">According to the </span></span><a href="http://php.net/manual/en/intro-whatcando.php" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7af552db580846acad220090da763c25" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="4b17acb155c540bea6adac1fe8b502ba"><span data-offset-key="4b17acb155c540bea6adac1fe8b502ba:0">PHP website</span></span></span></a><span key="7069cd34a88541f98e4c3b8e78f0a768"><span offset-key="7069cd34a88541f98e4c3b8e78f0a768:0">, you can:</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="7ef237d746d447849a8fd202b21dc85b"><span offset-key="7ef237d746d447849a8fd202b21dc85b:0">Collect form data</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="132d9423aac1404a8235cb8b91361ba2"><span offset-key="132d9423aac1404a8235cb8b91361ba2:0">Generate dynamic page content</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="4058b33a570b4172ab5abf2feeabc0fb"><span offset-key="4058b33a570b4172ab5abf2feeabc0fb:0">Send and receive cookies</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="c428e18972ab410b86ebe370375d09cb"><span offset-key="c428e18972ab410b86ebe370375d09cb:0">Write command line scripting</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="ab622e052d894c5290f2d41a48bbe712"><span offset-key="ab622e052d894c5290f2d41a48bbe712:0">Write server-side scripting</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="00f44550b37b469db6234921e8a391f1"><span offset-key="00f44550b37b469db6234921e8a391f1:0">Write desktop applications</span></span>

<span key="1e083d494c734a8dbacde75f33a4f150"><span offset-key="1e083d494c734a8dbacde75f33a4f150:0">Here are some </span></span><a href="https://stackshare.io/php" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7f3e9b1411314e04aa4153ae0c0ded3c" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="71056293c37043d3a8915736badc8e9d"><span data-offset-key="71056293c37043d3a8915736badc8e9d:0">companies using PHP</span></span></span></a><span key="0fb9bf964fa5407aa224f10d756c9e19"><span offset-key="0fb9bf964fa5407aa224f10d756c9e19:0"> in their dev teams:</span></span>

### 

<span key="689a65be439f4c3097d402751b8a7473"><span offset-key="689a65be439f4c3097d402751b8a7473:0">Backend Language #3: .NET (C#, VB)</span></span>

<span key="22df60faeb3143cba824f4c64b09e0af"><span offset-key="22df60faeb3143cba824f4c64b09e0af:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://www.asp.net" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="4655872773a0486ca100f8d95fe07744" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="ce1060bdf053498191df748290ce0f1d"><span data-offset-key="ce1060bdf053498191df748290ce0f1d:0">ASP.NET</span></span></span></a><span key="abe6fdf311444dfdb9e742eebc92d6ca"><span offset-key="abe6fdf311444dfdb9e742eebc92d6ca:0"> is Microsoft’s answer to Sun Microsystem’s (now, Oracle) Java. The web application framework is used to build websites using languages like Visual Basic (VB), C#, F#, and more.</span></span>

<span key="71dbbf6083cb46cab4e2b4db5a27bb2f"><span offset-key="71dbbf6083cb46cab4e2b4db5a27bb2f:0">Its MVC (Model-View-Controller) architectural pattern allows backend development duties to be handled by a controller, which interacts with a model to process data. The result is then presented to the view for display as a frontend web page.</span></span>

<span key="9eb0e324f8f54669a5822d746e51da67"><span offset-key="9eb0e324f8f54669a5822d746e51da67:0">Made open source in 2016, .NET can integrate with iOS, Linux, and Android by way of .NET Core. The code is highly stable and reliable, making it a popular choice for businesses. Because it is a Microsoft product, there is great support available if you ever get lost.</span></span>

<span key="6d9e4b493ae94cba988a48ead2c007ed">**C#**</span>

<span key="76b3eaf6f41e44a0807d72a8dc96f29b"><span offset-key="76b3eaf6f41e44a0807d72a8dc96f29b:0">C# is a high-level computer language, which means it allows developers to write programs that are </span></span><a href="https://www.webopedia.com/TERM/H/high_level_language.html" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="65518a61ca124e49af17f2ba9ac0f67b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="80ec8564d1d64b48827256407fb9c7e9"><span data-offset-key="80ec8564d1d64b48827256407fb9c7e9:0">independent of a particular type of computer</span></span></span></a><span key="12a3d887025f40cabd1d0a687b767497"><span offset-key="12a3d887025f40cabd1d0a687b767497:0">. Languages like these write and read more like human languages rather than machine languages.</span></span>

<span key="bcb5d1728b374bbcbece66602cc8b46d"><span offset-key="bcb5d1728b374bbcbece66602cc8b46d:0">C# is popular among developers because it has the power of C++ (another backend language) but is easier to use because it error-proofs commands that tend to trip up C++ users.</span></span>

<span key="bdf43cae6c34401886cd8d471801cadd"><span offset-key="bdf43cae6c34401886cd8d471801cadd:0">Programmers on Stack Overflow have praised the language for its “cool syntax.”</span></span>

<span key="720157f6aca94be38dfe3ca807392d70">**VB**</span>

<span key="a393fdd276ec45c69f14a7d84c03ab7b"><span offset-key="a393fdd276ec45c69f14a7d84c03ab7b:0">VB is a programming language that uses a graphical user interface (GUI) to </span></span><a href="https://searchwindevelopment.techtarget.com/definition/Visual-Basic" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bb430bd58e4544d3bd552c17d203903b" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="ddf6b9de37f940ba91f2709a71054102"><span data-offset-key="ddf6b9de37f940ba91f2709a71054102:0">modify code written in the BASIC programming language</span></span></span></a><span key="b1305c83bafc48fdac59bfddb0b6ae45"><span offset-key="b1305c83bafc48fdac59bfddb0b6ae45:0">. It’s an easy language to start with because of its straightforward syntax and its widespread use. As a result, it’s often used for prototyping.</span></span>

<span key="79c1f8ec41cc4ec2a17abf0970d6f757"><span offset-key="79c1f8ec41cc4ec2a17abf0970d6f757:0">The drawback of coding with VB is the large amount of memory required to install and run GUI-based development tools.</span></span>

### 

<span key="87a20b2c1b624abe8d88655e2d2615eb">**Backend Language #4: Ruby**</span>

<span key="904ad20bb9da4bc6bab413ba6487945e"><span offset-key="904ad20bb9da4bc6bab413ba6487945e:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/go/goskills-ruby-rails/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="d9527583455645c092bf0f07767a7088" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="60bf5f0c10b74c6483eb717f24cb7475"><span data-offset-key="60bf5f0c10b74c6483eb717f24cb7475:0">Ruby on Rails</span></span></span></a><span key="04341d56c0ff4f529b82f147236f6df8"><span offset-key="04341d56c0ff4f529b82f147236f6df8:0"> (or Ruby) is a web development language built on top of the Ruby programming language. Ruby on Rails has a set of tools that allow you to simply create basic tasks (e.g. you’re able to create a basic blog with one line of code).</span></span>

<span key="a867a4a74b8e4687a89d358800898ade"><span offset-key="a867a4a74b8e4687a89d358800898ade:0">Ruby involves little backend work, enabling developers to create and launch applications quickly. It is similar to Python in that it’s fantastic for prototyping. Ruby grew in popularity in the early 2000s as a result but has declined since then.</span></span>

<span key="6e10dcae9a4a4de4b51019f0b60183ed"><span offset-key="6e10dcae9a4a4de4b51019f0b60183ed:0">Ruby is open source, which means it can be modified and built upon.</span></span>

### 

<span key="2c990210c2e2489395d71845ab69b57f"><span offset-key="2c990210c2e2489395d71845ab69b57f:0">Backend Language #5: Python</span></span>

<span key="a010b1069daf4be583e244c774366626"><span offset-key="a010b1069daf4be583e244c774366626:0">There’s a reason </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/go/goskills-python/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="b5e8cbf3979b4116b7fc3de4c91e016e" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="93fd594fbe2c40e6a9edc4910eb74753"><span data-offset-key="93fd594fbe2c40e6a9edc4910eb74753:0">Python</span></span></span></a><span key="15fb3bdffe174dbd9cdad3615dcbf4b8"><span offset-key="15fb3bdffe174dbd9cdad3615dcbf4b8:0"> is the </span></span><a href="https://www.techrepublic.com/article/which-is-the-fastest-growing-programming-language-hint-its-not-javascript/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="e0154a225d5047db89f4295c14867fc6" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="32b33acb01264a29813778478e231cce"><span data-offset-key="32b33acb01264a29813778478e231cce:0">fastest-growing programming language</span></span></span></a><span key="d99117b0bc264639a60ab9cc6d4501de"><span offset-key="d99117b0bc264639a60ab9cc6d4501de:0">. The versatile language is used for both web and desktop development. Like with Java, there are plenty of tutorials and guides online, making it an accessible language for those just starting out.</span></span>

<span key="1dcd79f6a527469bac4cf6942a5bb4a6"><span offset-key="1dcd79f6a527469bac4cf6942a5bb4a6:0">Furthermore, its syntax is simple and easy to understand compared to other backend languages. Those who program with Python have lauded it for its “elegant,” “readable,” and “beautiful” code on Stack Overflow.</span></span>

<span key="4a003885ddda4c988cb8e31d1bbe9230"><span offset-key="4a003885ddda4c988cb8e31d1bbe9230:0">Reasons to learn Python as a backend developer</span></span>

<span key="da70de76de5f44be9bdffd9f06845967"><span offset-key="da70de76de5f44be9bdffd9f06845967:0">As mentioned above, Ruby and Python share similarities. They are both dynamically typed, open source, and object-oriented languages. The key differences between the two are the differences in popularity (Ruby is declining whereas Python is skyrocketing) and the tools in Ruby’s language.</span></span>

<span key="b57d4576ce514d589e7a5844f0e0c7df"><span offset-key="b57d4576ce514d589e7a5844f0e0c7df:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/programming/python/python-2-vs-python-3/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="df20bc92150e4be8a1ff2b6057a51428" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="6b4a1a177a254c739023f48b2a3d65a2"><span data-offset-key="6b4a1a177a254c739023f48b2a3d65a2:0">Learn about the differences between Python 2 and Python 3 here.</span></span></span></a><span key="82da87b8f19d469bb5532d5959500db5"><span offset-key="82da87b8f19d469bb5532d5959500db5:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="106d8e2f9dd74c54964a2cc2e2ed26be"><span offset-key="106d8e2f9dd74c54964a2cc2e2ed26be:0">Backend Language #6: SQL</span></span>

<span key="9ca5895ccf3f48a081d9b8d92eb0166c"><span offset-key="9ca5895ccf3f48a081d9b8d92eb0166c:0">Structured Query Language or </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/go/goskills-sql/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="f34ffeebc8e74a4abd432ca3f7bf8558" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="67300974f5fe4017a68e6228d0d01eb5"><span data-offset-key="67300974f5fe4017a68e6228d0d01eb5:0">SQL</span></span></span></a><span key="fa55824d63f14121a1dc19a3e41fb4f6"><span offset-key="fa55824d63f14121a1dc19a3e41fb4f6:0"> (pronounced ‘sequel’) is the most common query language. SQL is used to interact with databases.</span></span>

<span key="a85fc7dd1b174da4a2d58fa9c474ad62"><span offset-key="a85fc7dd1b174da4a2d58fa9c474ad62:0">SQL is great for beginners to learn since it’s a declarative language. A declarative language allows coders to ‘declare’ the results they would like to see, without specifying the steps or process for said result.</span></span>

<span key="e24793892405487da8fda28028786abb"><span offset-key="e24793892405487da8fda28028786abb:0">A query language like SQL is great for those who want to take advantage of the wealth of knowledge stored in databases.</span></span>

<span key="7374992109a1493eb51b60ae0ca0a579"><span offset-key="7374992109a1493eb51b60ae0ca0a579:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/posts/sql-guide/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="956071d94f534eb79c7e881f98b1a52d" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="c94f8ca62e664757b820183ba5715b7e"><span data-offset-key="c94f8ca62e664757b820183ba5715b7e:0">Learn more about SQL in the LTCWM guide.</span></span></span></a><span key="43d30d443b1e45a29caa38a46296709c"><span offset-key="43d30d443b1e45a29caa38a46296709c:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="3b1edb2525d347e08e1012c4777a4e45">**💡 WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH SQL**</span>

<span key="c8e2ad5b727f420b83b7f0e2fd7e1e5f"><span offset-key="c8e2ad5b727f420b83b7f0e2fd7e1e5f:0">SQL is used to access, manipulate, and create databases.</span></span>

<span key="b59c16fb51ee452890850f61250e5d58"><span offset-key="b59c16fb51ee452890850f61250e5d58:0">Those who work closely with data can benefit from learning SQL. This includes financial analysts, data-driven marketers, or online entrepreneurs. SQL is an ideal stepping stone for those who want to dive into the world of Big Data. For some inspiration, here is a list of jobs that use SQL the most.</span></span>

<span key="dfcdb5a6efc44d4bb13d3ed6598892c2">**💼 COMPANIES THAT USE SQL**</span>

<span key="00d47b1fcf434de090aaa943e7cfdcf1"><span offset-key="00d47b1fcf434de090aaa943e7cfdcf1:0">Since SQL is a query language, its use is broad and widespread. If a company or enterprise has a database, it is extremely probable that they are using SQL to query it.</span></span>

<span key="1d976344e3f14ec389abb34702906b20">**💵 AVERAGE SALARY OF SQL DEVELOPERS**</span>

<span key="3e43594f26a44b6f8c105cbad38559d7"><span offset-key="3e43594f26a44b6f8c105cbad38559d7:0">As of </span></span><a href="https://www.glassdoor.com/Salaries/sql-developer-salary-SRCH_KO0,13.htm" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="045450b98c8c4f219b7b2f3ef9c60f00" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="98f8cc4f30d0493c92922561f12a1206"><span data-offset-key="98f8cc4f30d0493c92922561f12a1206:0">April 2020</span></span></span></a><span key="e5555c80019046e094536fb67dee8836"><span offset-key="e5555c80019046e094536fb67dee8836:0">, SQL developers made an average of $81,622/year in the US, with salaries ranging from $61k to $130k.</span></span>

<span key="aab6b43a34c041f782848a6f13ecdd1d">**🗺️ WHERE TO LEARN SQL: INTRODUCTION TO SQL ON PLURALSIGHT**</span>

<span key="12fa1878797647c0a55918fc71405b7a">**What the course covers:**<span offset-key="12fa1878797647c0a55918fc71405b7a:1"> You’ll learn how to query data and shape results, create and modify data in tables, and learn how to actually modify tables themselves.</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="b569c0b075394cb08c9ec4c5ab5b71a5">**Skill level:**<span offset-key="b569c0b075394cb08c9ec4c5ab5b71a5:1"> Beginners</span></span>

<span key="6293fae1fda44845bc545736ad8c362f"><span offset-key="6293fae1fda44845bc545736ad8c362f:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/reviews/pluralsight/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="0e253bcfa40a4ed2ab2096487cfe6c62" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="b3ae5d383d944645bcfa5a54190b24ad"><em>(Read our full review of Pluralsight here.)</em></span></span></a><span key="e46fe8bf2f12478d821d8e8fdb09b739"><span offset-key="e46fe8bf2f12478d821d8e8fdb09b739:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="b4dac7712dc44b6bb3f0bda5dff48a25"><span offset-key="b4dac7712dc44b6bb3f0bda5dff48a25:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/posts/backend-development/#toc" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="ee4fc6dfbb044b56b873c94779ea95ef" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="351e1b84575d4e55bc4d8944fc2bee97"><span data-offset-key="351e1b84575d4e55bc4d8944fc2bee97:0">Head back to the table of contents »</span></span></span></a><span key="02ca661868bd46708de8c94d067245d9"><span offset-key="02ca661868bd46708de8c94d067245d9:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

### 

<span key="197f2c082b7444e7849a1910c37bbfa3"><span offset-key="197f2c082b7444e7849a1910c37bbfa3:0">Backend Language #7: JavaScript</span></span>

<span key="7055be4a7a1e4c3a82a995b8d697e58b"><span offset-key="7055be4a7a1e4c3a82a995b8d697e58b:0">Not to be confused with </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/posts/java-for-beginners/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="2999675d94b044649bd9a9d304fee058" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="ec3050c9080e4bdd8ffa5dc12cb83ded"><span data-offset-key="ec3050c9080e4bdd8ffa5dc12cb83ded:0">Java</span></span></span></a><span key="16d85a940943497ca80943c7047d9cf4"><span offset-key="16d85a940943497ca80943c7047d9cf4:0">, </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/learn/javascript/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="bc02ba31cfcb4aecbaf1a632f5786350" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="571bbfc655f64f16824e676f8d99ce63"><span data-offset-key="571bbfc655f64f16824e676f8d99ce63:0">JavaScript</span></span></span></a><span key="fefaf8463d584926bd2528ae807091c9"><span offset-key="fefaf8463d584926bd2528ae807091c9:0"> is a language that can be used for both the front end and back end.</span></span>

<span key="fadb9e4a650c43c1a3ad012f85c33ba3"><span offset-key="fadb9e4a650c43c1a3ad012f85c33ba3:0">It’s a great language for beginners because it is a higher-level language and there is little setup involved (you can start coding in your browser).</span></span><span slate-void="true" key="1653eb2009f848879022c62a4b241f40"></span>

<span key="4211f1710716487b996730eed73ad53b"><span offset-key="4211f1710716487b996730eed73ad53b:0"><span slate-zero-width="z">​</span></span></span>

<span key="7f01638ffbac4e219c87dc926038cc57"><span offset-key="7f01638ffbac4e219c87dc926038cc57:0">Because the language is so flexible, objects created in this language are slow. It is also difficult to maintain and scale, as with most dynamically typed languages.</span></span>

<span key="27c2ebc5347f4544836a79d7dca07470"><span offset-key="27c2ebc5347f4544836a79d7dca07470:0">Having said that, the language is ubiquitous, which means the community is large—affording you a slew of resources and plenty of opportunities for employment if you know JavaScript backend technologies.</span></span>

<span key="4d22ce148f49493f8c31f6c0718a42ca">**💡 WHAT YOU CAN DO WITH JAVASCRIPT**</span>

<span key="01d89fd320324dcc83d626bafa490bfe"><span offset-key="01d89fd320324dcc83d626bafa490bfe:0">JavaScript can be used to build many types of sites and software, including:</span></span>

    <span key="643770f6b4ab479eb545496a2a514ad0"><span offset-key="643770f6b4ab479eb545496a2a514ad0:0">Websites</span></span>

    <span key="f6d256bd45f841b7bfca4c6c0a801dc5"><span offset-key="f6d256bd45f841b7bfca4c6c0a801dc5:0">Mobile apps</span></span>

-   <img src="data:image/svg+xml;base64," class="r-1nf4jbm" />

    <span key="98366c00489e4fea9525d61c3e579c6a"><span offset-key="98366c00489e4fea9525d61c3e579c6a:0">Desktop applications</span></span>

    <span key="fa3be90ac8524d91915a36c6b8f43f6c"><span offset-key="fa3be90ac8524d91915a36c6b8f43f6c:0">Games</span></span>

## 

<span key="db127f71a7964dec813db6b1caed6821"><span offset-key="db127f71a7964dec813db6b1caed6821:0">Start Studying to Be a Backend Developer</span></span>

<span key="7300ce82d1a645d29c386ec4835b4f76"><span offset-key="7300ce82d1a645d29c386ec4835b4f76:0">In this overview, I hope you were able to get a clearer picture of backend development and the capabilities of each language included. This is by no means an exhaustive list of the backend languages that are out there. If you’re interested in learning more, Learn to Code With Me and </span></span><a href="https://learntocodewith.me/go/goskills-development/" class="css-4rbku5 css-1dbjc4n r-1loqt21 r-1471scf r-1otgn73 r-1i6wzkk r-lrvibr"><span data-key="7c471afc7c6e43399364812eb1a30196" data-rnw-int-class="nearest_257-18455_259-18456-237__"><span data-key="6c75f8f57bce4f2ba9585b776113a4ec"><span data-offset-key="6c75f8f57bce4f2ba9585b776113a4ec:0">GoSkills</span></span></span></a><span key="75fd2c58f52f4edf9788ff5a4bf686df"><span offset-key="75fd2c58f52f4edf9788ff5a4bf686df:0"> have easy-to-understand resources to guide you further.</span></span>

<span key="109042c2758248ee9fa9dfa77cc0c875"><span offset-key="109042c2758248ee9fa9dfa77cc0c875:0">If you are considering pursuing a career in development, I would highly recommend taking a look at the job descriptions of the roles you’re interested in and make a note of the languages that appear the most. Then, start studying those using backend language courses like the ones highlighted above.</span></span>
